label: Perceived snakebite risk (perceived risk)
description: Comments on whether the individual feels that he is at risk of snake bite in his community.
notes: See son codes: Do not perceive risk, in the field, at home, both, location: another.

label: Perceived snakebite risk (no perceived risk)
description: The individual does not perceive a risk of bite.
notes: Son code of the previous one.

code_id: Perceived snakebite risk in the field
label: Perceived snakebite risk in the field
description: The risk is perceived and considered greater in the field.

code_id: Perceived snakebite risk in the home
label: Perceived snakebite risk in the home
description: The risk is perceived and is considered greater in the home.

code_id: Perceived snakebite risk in the field and at home
label: Perceived snakebite risk in the field and at home
description: The risk is perceived the same at home and in the field.

label: Perceived snakebite risk (location: other)
description: The risk is perceived in a location other than the field or home.

label: Prevention knowledge (accurate)
description: Appropriate knowledge about how to prevent bites. Ex.: Flashlight, boots, cleaning.
notes: See Son Codes: Untasted, Inaccureate, No Knowledge, Misunderstanding.

label: Prevention knowledge (other)
description: Non -validated or unknown response. Ex.: Criolina.

label: Prevention knowledge (inaccurate)
description: Inappropriate knowledge to prevent bites.

label: Prevention knowledge (no knowledge)
description: The participant indicates not knowing how to prevent bites.

label: Prevention knowledge (misunderstanding of prevention)
description: The participant confuses treatment with treatment.

label: Treatment knowledge (accurate)
description: Appropriate knowledge about what to do after a bite.

label: Treatment knowledge (inaccurate)
description: Inappropriate knowledge about treatment after a bite.

label: Healthcare service logistics (positive)
description: Positive opinion about the process to receive medical care.

label: Healthcare service logistics (neutral)
description: Neutral opinion on the process.

label: Healthcare service logistics (negative)
description: Negative opinion about the process.

code_id: Healthcare system trust (mistrust in hospital in Carmen)
label: Healthcare system trust (mistrust in hospital in Carmen)
description: Distrust of El Carmen de Apical√° hospital.
notes: See Son Codes: General, Trust, Mistrust/Trust in/Outsis.

label: Healthcare system trust (general)
description: General trust in the health system to treat bites.

code_id: Healthcare system trust (trust in hospital in Carmen)
label: Healthcare system trust (trust in hospital in Carmen)
description: Specific trust at El Carmen Hospital.

code_id: Healthcare system trust (mistrust in hospitals outside)
label: Healthcare system trust (mistrust in hospitals outside)
description: Distrust of hospitals outside El Carmen.

code_id: Healthcare system trust (trust in hospitals outside)
label: Healthcare system trust (trust in hospitals outside)
description: Trust towards hospitals outside El Carmen.

label: Access to healthcare (accessible)
description: The participant considers that they can access health services.

label: Access to healthcare (inaccessible)
description: The participant considers that he cannot access health services.

label: Snake identification knowledge (accurate)
description: Appropriate capacity to identify snake species.
notes: See Son Codes: Inaccureate, no Knowledge, Unknown.

label: Snake identification knowledge (inaccurate)
description: Inability to correctly identify snake species.

label: Snake identification knowledge (no knowledge)
description: He has no knowledge about snake identification.

label: Snake identification knowledge (unknown)
description: Local knowledge with proper names, it can be necessary or not.

label: Snakebite experience
description: Own experience or acquaintances with bites.

label: Snakebite mortality experience
description: Ported experience that resulted in death.

label: Doubt
description: Doubt is perceived in the participant's response.

label: Misunderstanding of the question
description: The participant seems to have misunderstood the question.
